title: 'Forgive me that I couldn’t defend you': Dad of slain Ukraine family learned of deaths on Twitter - New York Post
content:
1. 'Forgive me that I couldn’t defend you': Dad of slain Ukraine family learned of deaths on Twitter  New York Post
  2. Silicon Valley tech worker was the Ukrainian mom lying dead on street in brutal photo that sparked outrage  San Francisco Chronicle
  3. A Family’s Dash Toward Safety in Ukraine Ends Tragically  The New York Times
  4. Palo Alto Tech Firm Says Executive, Her 2 Kids Killed In Ukraine Attack  KPIX CBS SF Bay Area
  5. Man returns to Ukraine after family slain while fleeing  The Associated Press - en Español
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Serhiy Perebyinis, 43, was in eastern Ukraine tending to his ailing mother when his family was killed. He broke down in tears talking about the senseless killings during an interview.
